ğŸ‘‹ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ í†µí•´ ì´í„°ëŸ¬ë¸” í”„ë¡œê·¸ë˜ë°

Model, Collection

class Model {
  constructor(attrs = {}) {
    this._attrs = attrs;
  }

  get(k) {
    return this._attrs[k];
  }

  set(k, v) {
    this._attrs[k] = v;
    return this;
  }
}

class Collection {
  constructor(models = []) {
    this._models = models;
  }

  at(idx) {
    return this._models[idx];
  }

  add(model) {
    this._models.push(model);
    return this;
  }
}

ì‚¬ìš©

const coll = new Collection();

coll.add(new Model({ id: 1, name: 'AA' }));
coll.add(new Model({ id: 3, name: 'BB' }));
coll.add(new Model({ id: 5, name: 'CC' }));

console.log(coll.at(2).get('name'));
console.log(coll.at(1).get('id'));

Collection ì œë„ˆë ˆì´í„° ì‚¬ìš© ì „

const coll = new Collection();

coll.add(new Model({ id: 1, name: 'AA' }));
coll.add(new Model({ id: 3, name: 'BB' }));
coll.add(new Model({ id: 5, name: 'CC' }));

_.go(
  L.range(3),
  L.map((i) => coll.at(i)),
  L.map((m) => m.get('name')),
  _.each(console.log),
);

Collection ì œë„ˆë ˆì´í„° ì ìš©

  • Classì— ì´í„°ëŸ¬ë¸”ë¡œ ìˆœíšŒí•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ ì ìš©í•¨
// ì ìš©1
class Collection {
	...
	*[Syombol.iterator]() {
		yield *this._models;
	}
}

// ì ìš©2
class Collection {
	...
	*[Syombol.iterator]() {
		return this._models[Symbol.iterator]();
	}
}

// ì œë„¤ë ˆì´í„° ì‚¬ìš©
_.go(
  coll,
  L.map(m => m.get('name')),
  _.each(console.log));

_.go(
  coll,
  _.each(m => m.set('name', m.get('name').toLowerCase())));

ğŸ‘‹ Product, Products - ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ í•¨ìˆ˜í˜•ìœ¼ë¡œ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê¸°

class Model {
  constructor(attrs = {}) {
    this._attrs = attrs;
  }

  get(k) {
    return this._attrs[k];
  }

  set(k, v) {
    this._attrs[k] = v;
    return this;
  }
}

class Collection {
  constructor(models = []) {
    this._models = models;
  }

  at(idx) {
    return this._models[idx];
  }

  add(model) {
    this._models.push(model);
    return this;
  }
}

const add = (a, b) => a + b;
const addAll = _.reduce(add);

class Products extends Collection {
  getPrices() {
    return L.map((p) => p.get('price'), this);
  }

  totalPrice() {
    return addAll(this.getPrices());
  }
}

const products = new Products();
products.add(new Product({ id: 1, price: 10000 }));
console.log(products.totalPrice());

products.add(new Product({ id: 3, price: 25000 }));
console.log(products.totalPrice());

products.add(new Product({ id: 5, price: 35000 }));
console.log(products.totalPrice());
